name: Machine Learning Packing Tool
description: My capstone project that I created in 10 days using the unfamiliar technology Tensorflow.js. Other technologies: Semantic-Ui React, React, PostgreSQL, Knex.js.

name: Library Application
description: A full CRUD application that I was to create in 4 days (initially, continuing work as well). The application was to act like a library application, and to be made using Agile methodologies with user stories. Technologies: Semantic-Ui React, React, PostgreSQL, Knex.js.

name: Full CRUD Beer Review App
description: A full CRUD front end React app that uses Semantic-Ui. It connects to a back end PostgreSQL database and Knex RESTful server. Technologies: Semantic-Ui React, React, PostgreSQL, Knex.js.

name: React Bookstore
description: My first React App. Created to work like a shopping cart for a bookstore with search functionality. Technologies: React, CSS, JavaScript, HTML

name: RESTful Express Server
description: An Express server created using RESTful programming, MCV architecture, and pair programming. Technologies: Express.js, JavaScript

name: React Inbox
description: A React app created to look like an email inbox. This app was my first attempt at making patch, post and delete requests to an API. Technologies: Bootstrap, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS
